statements: SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals;
SELECT brand_name, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE brand_name = 'Nike';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT id, brand_name FROM SponsorshipDeals ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY festival_name ASC
SELECT brand_name, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE festival_name = 'Music Festival' AND amount < 10000 AND start_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE end_date < '2022-09-30'
SELECT brand_name, festival_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS deal_duration FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY deal_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, festival_name FROM SponsorshipDeals ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BrandAgreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT brand_name, agreement_type FROM BrandAgreements ORDER BY agreement_type DESC;
SELECT festival_name, deal_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE deal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY deal_amount DESC;
SELECT brand_name, festival_name, deal_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE deal_amount > 10000
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE festival_name = 'Music Festival' ORDER BY deal_amount DESC
SELECT brand_name, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM BrandAgreements WHERE agreement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY agreement_date ASC
SELECT brand_name, festival_name FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE deal_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT brand_name, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM BrandAgreements WHERE agreement_type = 'Partnership'
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals;
SELECT deal_id, brand_name, festival_name, deal_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE deal_amount > 5000;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM FestivalDetails WHERE ticket_price < 100;
SELECT brand_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM BrandContacts;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, location, ticket_price FROM FestivalDetails WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals;
SELECT brand_name, deal_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE deal_amount > 10000;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM FestivalDetails WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM BrandContacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM FestivalDetails ORDER BY start_date DESC, ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM festival WHERE start_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT brand_name, industry, contact_person, email FROM brand;
SELECT brand_name, industry, contact_person FROM brand WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM festival WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, industry, contact_person FROM brand WHERE industry = 'Technology';

SELECT festival.festival_name, brand.brand_name, sponsorship_deal.deal_amount FROM festival JOIN sponsorship_deal ON festival.festival_id = sponsorship_deal.festival_id JOIN brand ON sponsorship_deal.brand_id = brand.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM agreement ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sponsorship_Deals;
SELECT brand_id, festival_id, start_date, end_date FROM Sponsorship_Deals WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_id, festival_id, start_date, end_date FROM Sponsorship_Deals ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM Festivals WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT * FROM Sponsorship_Deals WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location FROM Festivals WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT deal_id, term_description, term_value FROM Deal_Terms WHERE term_value > 5000 ORDER BY term_value ASC;
SELECT contact_id, email, phone_number FROM Brand_Contact WHERE brand_id = 3 AND contact_name IS NOT NULL;
